description: Describes an access policy, which specifies an identity's access to an IoT SiteWise Monitor portal or project.

parameters.name: accessPolicyId
parameters.description: The ID of the access policy.

nested_items.name: accessPolicyId
nested_items.description: The ID of the access policy.

nested_items.name: accessPolicyArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the access policy, which has the following format.

nested_items.name: accessPolicyIdentity
nested_items.description: The identity (IAM Identity Center user, IAM Identity Center group, or IAM user) to which this access policy applies.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The IAM Identity Center ID of the user.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The IAM Identity Center ID of the group.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the IAM user. For more information, see IAM ARNs in the IAM User Guide.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the IAM role. For more information, see IAM ARNs in the IAM User Guide.

nested_items.name: accessPolicyResource
nested_items.description: The IoT SiteWise Monitor resource (portal or project) to which this access policy provides access.

nested_items.name: accessPolicyPermission
nested_items.description: The access policy permission. Note that a project ADMINISTRATOR is also known as a project owner.

nested_items.name: accessPolicyCreationDate
nested_items.description: The date the access policy was created, in Unix epoch time.

nested_items.name: accessPolicyLastUpdateDate
nested_items.description: The date the access policy was last updated, in Unix epoch time.
